messages.content: How do I check my current phone plan?
Log in to your account online or using our mobile app. Go to 'My Plan' to see all details of your current phone plan.
I want to upgrade to an unlimited data plan.
You can upgrade anytime by visiting the 'Plans & Upgrades' section in your account or calling our customer support team.
Why is my bill higher this month?
Higher bills can be due to overages, one-time fees, international usage, or promotional discounts ending. Check your detailed bill in the Billing section.
How can I reset my voicemail PIN?
Dial *98 from your phone and follow the prompts to reset your voicemail PIN. You can also do this on your account page under 'Voicemail Settings'.
My phone has no signal. What should I do?
Try restarting your phone, toggling airplane mode, or inserting your SIM again. If the issue continues, check our outage map or contact support.
How do I report a network outage in my area?
You can report outages through the mobile app under 'Network Status' or by calling customer support.
Can I transfer my number to another carrier?
Yes. Provide your new carrier with your account number and transfer PIN, which you can find in your account settings.
Do you offer family plans?
Yes, we offer family plans with shared data and discounts for multiple lines. Check the 'Family Plans' section for pricing.
How can I pay my bill online?
Log in to your account and go to 'Billing.' You can pay by credit card, debit card, or bank transfer.
I’m traveling abroad. How do I enable international roaming?
Activate roaming by going to 'International Settings' in your account. You can also add travel passes for reduced rates.
Why are my calls dropping frequently?
Dropped calls can be caused by weak signal or network congestion. Try resetting network settings or contact support for troubleshooting.
Can I block unwanted callers?
Yes, block callers from your phone settings or enable our spam-blocking service in your account under 'Call Protection'.
Where can I find my usage history?
Your data, call, and text history can be found under 'Usage Details' in your online account or mobile app.
How do I replace a lost SIM card?
Visit any of our stores or order a replacement SIM online under 'Device Support'. Activation instructions will be included.
My mobile data is very slow.
Slow data could be due to network congestion or data limits. Try restarting your phone or checking your plan’s data status.
How do I update my contact information?
Log in and go to 'Account Settings' to update your phone number, email address, and mailing address.
Do you offer phone insurance?
Yes, we offer protection plans for accidental damage, loss, and theft. Visit 'Device Protection' to enroll.
My phone won’t activate.
Make sure your SIM card is inserted properly and follow the activation steps shown in your account. If issues persist, contact support.
How can I track my phone order?
You can track your order from the 'Orders' page in your account, where shipping updates are provided.
Can I set spending limits for my child’s phone line?
Yes. Enable parental controls in your account under 'Family Management' to set data or purchase limits.
Why am I not receiving text messages?
Ensure your messaging app is functioning, your SIM is active, and your phone has signal. If not, try restarting or contacting support.
Do you have prepaid plans?
Yes, we offer several prepaid plans with no contracts. Visit the 'Prepaid Plans' section for details.
How long does it take to process a payment?
Payments usually process immediately but may take up to 24 hours depending on your bank.
Can I pause my service temporarily?
Yes, you can suspend your service for up to 90 days through 'Account Management'.
